content:
Hi, I'm a hardware design engineer from California! I've been using Rust since late 2018 to "automate the boring stuff," before that I was mainly using Python, C, and Go.
I don't have a formal education in software, but I'd like to get my feet wet and learn more about the compiler internals, all the way from the lexer stage down to LLVM IR generation. Any recommendations for guides or documentation is appreciated!
https://rustc-dev-guide.rust-lang.org/ might be a good place to start
